backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, chat conversations, and WebRTC call signaling with permission checks and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping authentication-related features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files including screens, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH variables to provide light/dark mode color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/README.md: Developer documentation outlining project structure, setup steps, and guidance for modifying the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global providers, wrapping screens in a layout and triggering profile-setup modal logic.
frontend/src/components/CallModal.tsx: Modal UI for WebRTC calls handling media setup, offer/answer flow, ICE candidates, and polling-based signaling.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperInfoCar: Information card showing developer tips, code locations, deployment steps, and a dynamic link to documentation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component allowing users to enter and save name and email, submitting via a mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/WhatchatLayout.t: Main app layout providing header, navigation, auth-aware controls, and polling-based unread message badge updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity, login flow, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePollingRefetch.ts: Hook for interval-based refetching that pauses when the tab is hidden and cleans up timers on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor chat methods for profiles, conversations, messages, unread counts, and WebRTC signaling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSignOut.ts: Hook that clears identity, resets queries, sets skip-auto-login marker, and redirects to the home route.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRTCCall.ts: Hook managing WebRTC call setup including media initialization, peer connection handling, ICE flow, and call controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theme variables for light and dark modes, plus chat wallpaper utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders App.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Handles login flow with Internet Identity, auto-navigation, and a landing screen with feature highlights.
frontend/src/screens/ChatListScreen.tsx: Displays the user's conversation list with polling, start-chat dialog, and navigation; enforces auth.
frontend/src/screens/ChatThreadScreen.ts: Shows messages for a conversation, handles sending, polling, read state, and call initiation; enforces auth.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Displays profile and principal info with copy actions, and provides sign-out handling; enforces auth.
frontend/src/utils/authBootstrap.ts: Manages a sessionStorage flag to control skipping auto-login after sign-out.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them to sessionStorage, retrieve them, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
